item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (95 points | 14 comments)
2. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (297 points | 216 comments)
3. NASA, Axiom Space Change Assembly Order of Commercial Space Station (26 points | discuss)
4. Fish 4.0: The Fish of Theseus (240 points | 18 comments)
5. EmacsConf 2024 Notes (244 points | 65 comments)
6. AnkiAIUtils: Flashcards+AI Illustrations, Explanations, Mnemonics etc. – FOSS (41 points | 5 comments)
7. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (378 points | 282 comments)
8. I automated my job application process (261 points | 410 comments)
9. Joco almost died at launch. Now, it's a lifeline for e-bike delivery riders (32 points | 7 comments)
10. The Gambler Who Cracked the Horse-Racing Code (55 points | 24 comments)
11. EU law mandating universal chargers for devices comes into force (105 points | 68 comments)
12. My history with Forth and stack machines (2010) (73 points | 15 comments)
13. Libero – A Programmer's Tool and Code Generator (1997) (28 points | 8 comments)
14. Numbers Are Leaves (180 points | 50 comments)
15. 38C3: Blinkencity, radio controlling street lamps and power plants [video] (4 points | 1 comment)
16. Analyzing North Korean Malware (34 points | 3 comments)
17. That's not an abstraction, that's a layer of indirection (528 points | 212 comments)
18. The Unicon Programming Language (64 points | 7 comments)
19. Should more of us be moving to live near friends? (540 points | 400 comments)
20. Carlsen disqualified from World Rapid and Blitz championship for wearing jeans (215 points | 297 comments)
21. Finding and exploiting hidden features of Animal Crossing's NES emulator (7 points | discuss)
22. Google's Results Are Infested, Open AI Is Using Their Playbook from the 2000s (333 points | 379 comments)
23. Family of OpenAI whistleblower Suchir Balaji demand FBI investigate death (127 points | 27 comments)
24. What would happen if you made a planet out of fish? (4 points | discuss)
25. Building a 3D safety sensor with Rust (76 points | 16 comments)
26. Exploring Microsoft's Phi-3-Mini and its integration with tool like Ollama (53 points | 23 comments)
27. Liberating Wi-Fi on the ESP32 [video] (304 points | 116 comments)
28. TSMC's Arizona Plant to Start Making Advanced Chips (324 points | 155 comments)
29. Plasticlist Report – Data on plastic chemicals in Bay Area foods (580 points | 179 comments)
30. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff Engineers in NYC ( | hide)
